msbt.message: Having someone at my house is super exciting!

Hanging out at home is tr√®s fab. Gives you time to justunwind.This magazine called Cooking & Meditation Weekly said cooking is great for "leveling up" your mind.Since I can't cook, I just played Super Chef RPG IV for 24 hours<10_4 /> Now I feel more sleepy than relaxed.

Don't go around looking in places you shouldn't, 'K? Because, like, it could bewell, I totally don't want to say incriminating, buuuthands in your pockets, please., it's fun to have you over. We have to do this more!
When I lived at home, my room was a total grody storm. Mom would clean it up when I was littleBut once you grow up, you have to do everything, like, for yourself! So now I fight the grody storm!

When I move to a new house, the first few days there, Ithis is weird, but it doesn't feel like it's MINE.It's like I'm staying over at somebody else's place.But after a little while, likeit turns into HOME. It's warm and safe and your own little place in the world.I don't know if other folks go through that, but I do, and I thought I'd tell my bestie about it.
Wow! You're both here at the same time? Howtotally weird! Both of you! Here! At the same time!What a weird day!<10_4 /> So weird!
Oh wow! Totally make yourself at home! It's so cool to have both of you here at the same time!
This is probs a great chance to get to know a little better!
Ohmigosh! SO many folks over! I'm probs going to be SO sad when they all leave.Nah! Once everyone's bolted, I'll just sing really loud and BOOM! I'll feel aaall better! Just like always
When everyone comes over to hang out, I swear my place feels so, so much brighter than usual!
I love hanging out with my friends! I'm so super, totally, mega happy right now, !<10_4 /> SO HAPPY!
